com.pump.image.gif.block

Class GifHeaderBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifBlock
      • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifHeaderBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GifConstants

    public class GifHeaderBlock
extends GifBlock
    This is the first block in of data in a GIF file. This parser only supports a header of "GIF89a" or "GIF87a".

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • GifHeaderBlock

        public GifHeaderBlock()
        Creates a "GIF89a" header

      • GifHeaderBlock

        protected GifHeaderBlock(byte[] b)
        This constructs a GifHeaderBlock from 6 bytes. This throws exceptions if the array does not read "GIF89a" or "GIF87a".
        Parameters:
        b - this array is not cloned, it is referenced directly.

    • Method Detail

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Description copied from class: GifBlock
        This outputs the exact byte representation of this block.

        A series of these byte arrays combined can create a GIF file.

        Specified by:
        getBytes in class GifBlock
